creditline: Gift of Joanne Leonard in memory and honor of Justice Ruth Bader Ginsburg, and in honor of her daughter, Jane C. Ginsburg, and Joanne's daughter, Julia M. Leonard
description: black and white image of a Black couple seated together, holding hands; woman holds man's PL hand in both of hers
markings: on back on sticker: Joanne Leonard / 1319 Pomona Road / Ann Arbor, Mich. 48103 | on back stamped in black: JOANNE LEONARD
signed: on back in pencil: Joanne Leonard / Soldier on leave, with his bride, West Oakland
title: Soldier on Leave, with his Bride, West Oakland
